attributes.action: To close some of the charity shops there are to many in the town centre
attributes.additional_details: Some of these charity shops have got to be closed in the town centre because there are about 14 and that's far to many and some are next door to each other and none were the shops shirts with no ID cards so when anyone has to go for a meeting know one even knows if that person is the right one because when I was working as a volunteer I had to were the shirt and my ID card so anyone would know that I was that person and none even have a office or do fundraising because they have closed that department down and there are also to many Hairdressers and Restaurants  and so were is the verity around the town centre a couple of shops and a newsagents that's a disgrace and the 4 MPs also think so as well so there need to be a change around the town centre and when people come here to visit they would say one thing there is nothing here I would go back home so please do your job properly okay
